now, i know the hype surrounding this film, and so i thought all people who said this film is boring were morons. But no, those who say this is scary are morons.

By the time the most scariest part comes, i.e, the ending, you are so bored that you hardly get scared because you desperately want the film to end.

I am not strictly against this new handheld cam genre, i loved cloverfield. But this is the first time i miss blood in a horror film.
